title: Evaluation of high-pressure homogenization as a pretreatment for the extraction and drying of 6-gingerol from ginger
content:

6-Gingerol is the major biologically active component found in the ginger rhizome, and this study investigated the effect of high-pressure homogenization pretreatment on the recovery of 6-gingerol.
